name: Winword LOLBIN Usage
description:
Detects Winword process loading custmom dlls via the '/l' switch.
Winword can be abused as a LOLBIN to download arbitrary file or load arbitrary DLLs.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp]\:\/\/.*/ OR /.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp][Ss]\:\/\/.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\WINWORD.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:WinWord.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\/l\ * OR *.dll* OR *http\:\/\/* OR *https\:\/\/*))`
